localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Improve your teams collaboration and invite them to your very own shared digital whiteboard. Just start a new project and draw away. Our web whiteboard is incredibly fast and simple to use, so anyone can do it. Yeah including Phil from accounting.
blogPost.body: Improve your teams collaboration and invite them to your very own shared digital whiteboard. Just start a new project and draw away. Our web whiteboard is incredibly fast and simple to use, so anyone can do it. Yeah including Phil from accounting.
blogPost.title: Online Whiteboard - Easy to use online whiteboard where you can share anything
blogPost.author: Perry Steward

localize.description: 改善你的团队协作，邀请他们到你自己的共享数字白板。只需开始一个新的项目，然后画出来。我们的网络白板使用起来非常快速和简单，所以任何人都可以做到这一点。是的，包括会计界的Phil。
localize.tagline: 易于使用的在线白板，你可以分享任何东西。

localize.description: 改善你的團隊協作，邀請他們到你自己的共享數字白板。只需開始一個新的項目，然後畫出來。我們的網絡白板使用起來非常快速和簡單，所以任何人都可以做到這一點。是的，包括會計界的Phil。
localize.tagline: 易於使用的在線白板，你可以分享任何東西。

previous.excerpt: Refty collects twice as many references in half the time, turning them into actionable insights. Trust long-term experiences over intuition!
previous.title: Refty - Reference checks made easy and measurable

localize.description: Refty 用一半的时间收集两倍的参考资料，并将其转化为可操作的见解。相信长期的经验，而不是直觉
localize.tagline: 证明人调查变得简单和可衡量

localize.description: Refty 用一半的時間收集兩倍的參考資料，並將其轉化爲可操作的見解。相信長期的經驗，而不是直覺
localize.tagline: 證明人調查變得簡單和可衡量

next.excerpt: SigNoz is an open-source alternative to DataDog. We help developers find issues in the software they run on cloud and solve them quickly. Run SigNoz in your infrastructure and get your application monitoring setup at 10x lower cost
next.title: SigNoz - Open source alternative to Datadog

localize.description: SigNoz是DataDog的开源替代产品。我们帮助开发人员发现他们在云上运行的软件中的问题，并快速解决这些问题。在您的基础架构中运行SigNoz，并以10倍的成本获得您的应用程序监控设置。
SigNoz是DataDog的開源替代產品。我們幫助開發人員發現他們在雲上運行的軟件中的問題，並快速解決這些問題。在您的基礎架構中運行SigNoz，並以10倍的成本獲得您的應用程序監控設置。
